Visibility: 32 km

Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: S 17 km/h

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Snow mixed with ice pellets before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 4 except 8 inland.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to drizzle and ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning. Wind becoming light near noon. High plus 4 except 8 inland. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain at times mixed with snow beginning early in the evening and ending near midnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
